org.jplot2d.swing.proptable.editor

Class AbstractPropertyEditor<T extends java.awt.Component>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jplot2d.swing.proptable.editor.AbstractPropertyEditor<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyEditor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BooleanPropertyEditor, ColorPropertyEditor, ComboBoxPropertyEditor, DoubleArrayEditor, FloatArrayEditor, FontPropertyEditor, FormattedEditor, StringPropertyEditor

    public abstract class AbstractPropertyEditor<T extends java.awt.Component>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.beans.PropertyEditor
    Once the editor component change, firePropertyChange(Object, Object) should be called to notify all the listeners.
